comment: Norwegian national radio channels from NRK. P1.  All streams are high quality MP3 format. The complete list of NRK channels is here: https://lyd.nrk.no/

feeds.name: NRK P1 Stor-Oslo
feeds.description: NRK's main radio channel - News and regional content from Greater Oslo
feeds.comment: P1 is regional - this is the Greater Oslo version. Other regions are available at lyd.nrk.no

feeds.name: NRK P2
feeds.description: Norwegian culture, society and in-depth news
feeds.comment: National channel - same stream for all regions

feeds.name: NRK P3
feeds.description: Norwegian youth channel with music and entertainment
feeds.comment: National channel - same stream for all regions
